title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 68 - Charges For Professional Health Services
content:

State Regulations
§ 68.0 - Preamble
§ 68.1 - Adoption of certain workers' compensation schedules
§ 68.2 - Establishment of certain health provider schedules
§ 68.3 - Applicability of limitations
§ 68.4 - Exception to limitations
§ 68.5 - Health services not set forth in schedules
§ 68.6 - Health services performed outside New York State

§ 68.10 - [Repealed]
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 68

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201, 301, 2601, 5108, 5221, art. 51

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
